name: wazuh-documentation
description: Wazuh is a free, open source and enterprise-ready security monitoring solution for threat detection, integrity monitoring, incident response and compliance.

scripts.css:compile:google-fonts: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/google-fonts.scss src/css/google-fonts.css
scripts.css:compile:bootstrap: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/libs/bootstrap/bootstrap.scss src/css/bootstrap.css
scripts.css:compile:page:default: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/pages/wazuh-documentation.scss src/css/wazuh-documentation.css
scripts.css:compile:page:api: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/pages/api-reference.scss src/css/api-reference.css
scripts.css:compile:page:index: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/pages/index.scss src/css/index.css
scripts.css:compile:page:not-found: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/pages/not-found.scss src/css/not-found.css
scripts.css:compile:page:search: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 src/scss/pages/search-results.scss src/css/search-results.css

author: Wazuh, Inc.
